text: Euphorbia leistneri is a species of succulent plant in the family Euphorbiaceae. It is endemic to northwest-Namibia and southwest-Angola near the Kunene river. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical dry shrubland. It is threatened by habitat loss. Euphorbia leistneri is closely related to Euphorbia monteiri. ==References== Category:Endemic flora of Namibia leistneri Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Euphorbia leistneri
